Novel Baswedan: Presiden Jokowi Tidak Serius Ungkap Kasus Saya
02 Nov 2019, 02:44 by M Rosseno Aji, Endri Kurniawati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Penyidik senior Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi Novel Baswedan menilai Presiden Joko Widodo tidak serius mengungkap kasus teror penyiraman air keras yang menimpanya. Sejak awal ia tak yakin kasusnya akan diungkap oleh Polri. â€œPresiden kemudian memberikan waktu pada Polri sampai terus begini, itu berarti menunjukan Presiden tidak serius," kata Novel saat dihubungi, Sabtu, 2 November 2019.
Novel mengatakan sulit baginya untuk percaya bahwa polri mampu mengungkap kasus yang sudah tidak terungkap selama dua tahun lebih ini. Menurut dia, Jokowi sudah memberikan tiga kali perintah kepada kepolisian untuk mengungkap kasus ini.
Terakhir kali, Jokowi memberikan waktu tiga bulan kepada tim teknis untuk menangkap pelaku penyerangan. Waktu tiga bulan itu berakhir pada Oktober 2019. Kepolisian mengklaim mendapatkan temuan yang signifikan. Namun, mereka gagal menangkap pelaku penyerangan.
Seharusnya, kata Novel, Jokowi merasa tidak nyaman ketika perintahnya diabaikan oleh kepolisian. Namun, ia beranggapan Jokowi justru bersikap sebaliknya. "Ketika perintahnya diabaikan, beliau seolah nyaman," kata dia.
Jokowi memberi waktu tambahan kepada Kepala Kepolisian RI Jenderal Idham Azis untuk menuntaskan kasus Novel Baswedan hingga Desember 2019. Idham adalah mantan Kabareskrim yang mengepalai tim teknis kasus Novel Baswedan.
Idham Kapolda Metro Jaya, ketika Novel diserang pada April 2017. "Saya sudah sampaikan ke Kapolri baru, saya beri waktu sampai awal Desember," kata Jokowi dalam dialog bersama wartawan Istana Kepresidenan di Istana Merdeka, Jakarta, Jumat, 1 November 2019.
M ROSSENO AJI | FRISKI RIANA

Baswedan's Novel: President Jokowi Is Not Serious in Expressing My Case
02 Nov 2019, 02:44 by M Rosseno Aji, Endri Kurniawati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Senior Corruption Eradication Commission Novel Baswedan judge President Joko Widodo is not serious about uncovering terrorism cases that hit him. From the beginning he was not sure the case would be revealed by the National Police. "The President then gives time to the Police to continue like this, it means showing the President is not serious," Novel said when contacted, Saturday, November 2, 2019.
The novel said it was difficult for him to believe that the National Police could uncover cases that had not been revealed for more than two years. According to him, Jokowi has given three orders to the police to reveal this case.
Last time, Jokowi gave the technical team three months to arrest the perpetrators of the attack. The three-month period ends in October 2019. Police claim to have significant findings. However, they failed to capture the perpetrators of the attack.
Supposedly, said Novel, Jokowi felt uncomfortable when his orders were ignored by the police. However, he considers Jokowi to be the opposite. "When his orders were ignored, he seemed comfortable," he said.
Jokowi gave additional time to the Indonesian Police Chief General Idham Azis to resolve the Baswedan Novel case until December 2019. Idham is a former Kabareskrim who heads the technical team of the Baswedan Novel case.
Idham Kapolda Metro Jaya, when the novel was attacked in April 2017. "I have conveyed it to the new National Police Chief, I give time until early December," Jokowi said in a dialogue with reporters at the Presidential Palace at the Merdeka Palace, Jakarta, Friday, November 1, 2019.
